characterDescription:
Miasal was a 5-year-old girl from Hearthstone who fell far from a height and suffered a broken leg. The compound fracture spurt red where bone had split the skin because one of the girl's lower leg arteries was severed.
While Kaladin thought that he could save her (a 13-year-old himself at the time), the girl's blood loss was too great. Her father, Harl, is left distraught and wailing upon her death.
